title: All Ball - State of Youth Hoops Development in 2020, Coaching Philosophy, Fundamentals with NBA Skills Trainer Shea Frazee
itunes:title: All Ball - State of Youth Hoops Development in 2020, Coaching Philosophy, Fundamentals with NBA Skills Trainer Shea Frazee
description:
This week, Gottlieb talks with NBA skills trainer Shea Frazee on the current state of youth hoops in 2020, his philosophy in player development, fundamental changes he would make in the development process. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
